testcase.name: Successful login with valid credentials
testcase.system-out: Given the user is on the login page.........................................passed When the user enters valid username and password............................passed Then the user should see the logout message.................................passed

testcase.name: Login fails with invalid credentials
testcase.system-out: Given the user is on the login page.........................................passed When the user enters invalid username and password..........................passed Then the user should see an error message...................................passed
